answers.answer: Congratulations for having the determination to quit!My husband quit smoking a year ago in January.  During the first year, he had bronchitis three times.  The doctor explained that it was probably due to the fact that he quit smoking.  He said that he will always be prone to having bronchitis but it will diminish with the years.

title: Side Affects of giving up smoking
